channel.title: Haade
channel.description: Home Assistance Alsace home automation & electronics.

item.title: Home Assistant unveils its new product, the voice preview edition
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
As a preview we are testing the home assistant voice Preview Edition, the first product in this range for Nabu Casa, control your home locally by voice okay Nabu a first! Magical!

This is very interesting news for the opensource home automation community. Nabu casa, which needs no introduction, has released its first functional voice assistant, practical and for 100% local use.

Read the full article: Home Assistant unveils its new product, the voice preview edition on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: New features expected for Sonoff at the end of the year
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Lots of new features for Sonoff products and firmwares expected in November and December, Zigbee, new modules, in short, something crunchy

Live from the brand Sonoff (itead.cc) I bring you the new products and news expected for this month of December live from the factory of the Chinese Santa Claus üéÖüèª at Sonoff!

Read the full article: New features expected for Sonoff at the end of the year on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Install Home Assistant OS on Dietpi
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Here is a relevant article to install HAOS on Dietpi the ultra light RPI operating system on a diet, why bother to do such an installation when there is a ready-made HAOS image for raspberry pi?

Why bother installing Home Assistant OS on dietpi when there is a ready-made image based on raspberry pi os Lite on the official website, or even simpler via the software imager developed by the Raspberry PI foundation which contains the HAOS image.

Read the full article: Install Home Assistant OS on Dietpi on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Home assistant Yellow, for whom?
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Testing and integration of modules of the Yellow box, the first box to be released by the Nabu Casa company, what are its strong points and who is it for?

Some time ago I introduced you to the box home assistant Green, a plug‚Äôn play box at less than 100‚Ç¨ which is causing a sensation in the world of home automation. Today it‚Äôs the turn of the Home Assistant yellow, released well before the green box, this box is not [...]

Read the full article: Home assistant Yellow, for whom? on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Sonoff - Automate your conventional heating
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Transform your NSPanel Pro into a boiler contactor by directly integrating the Sonoff RE5VC micro module and control everything using the Ewelink application

In order to best prepare for the next Live, and always with the aim of deepening our knowledge of the modules in the Sonoff range, we will try in this article to automate a conventional heating system while remaining in the Sonoff universe and Ewelink.

Read the full article: Sonoff - Automate your conventional heating on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Box Homey Pro - the quiet force
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Test of the Homey pro early 2023 home automation box, disconcertingly simple, this box offers undeniable advantages for home automation novices, it has many positive points like all these available protocols, but does it have all the advantages on its side?

Here is a test that I can‚Äôt wait to present to you, thanks to Athom the manufacturer of the Homey Pro (Early 2023) box and Domadoo, I was able to acquire a latest generation Homey Pro (Early 2023) box. Athom sells this box for ‚Ç¨399 no less! I hope that [...]

Read the full article: Box Homey Pro - the quiet force on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Home Assistant - Automation and heating saving
item.dc:creator: Nico
August
item.description:
August returns to the video of March 28 concerning heating savings and home automation works and provides figures on its consumption and savings made since February 2024

After 9 months of installation, August returns to take stock of the youtube channel to talk to you about energy savings achieved thanks to a Home Assistant home automation installation.

Read the full article: Home Assistant - Automation and heating saving on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: New Nspanel Pro 120 WOW!
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
A test eagerly awaited that of the brand new sonoff Nspanel pro 120 PW, a format that is unanimous but it is not only the size that counts. I will, you guessed it, compare it to the NsPanel Pro 86

Another expected article, given the number of sales made by itead concerning the nspanel pro, it doesn‚Äôt surprise me. Here I received for testing the new NSPanel pro 120 provided by itead and I thank them for it. I carried out some tests and made a comparison with the NSPanel [...]

Read the full article: New Nspanel Pro 120 WOW! on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Comfee Easy Dry 20 dehumidifier test
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Test of the Easy dry 20 two-in-one dehumidifier with ionizer function and integration into the Home Assistant home automation assistant.

After a very rainy 2024 season, I found myself with a humidity level and mold in the basement. So I started looking to buy a dehumidifier. And I wanted it to be compatible with my favorite assistant Home Assistant.

Read the full article: Comfee Easy Dry 20 dehumidifier test on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Test of the Saswell SAS980 Zigbee watering controller
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
I am testing a Zigbee watering module the Saswell SAS980 with intelligent timer and water flow measurement also manufactured under the RTX brand reference ZVG1 which has the particularity of measuring water consumption but not only that.

After testing the irrigation module Zigbee Woox R7060 last year , today I am tackling the test of the Saswell SAS980SWT-7-Z01 sold under white label by RTX under the reference ZVG1. It is recognized under this reference in Zigbee2mqtt, but since then Saswell has resumed sales under this name. You [...]

Read the full article: Test of the Saswell SAS980 Zigbee watering controller on the blog Haade.fr.
